name: 吳玉娟
objective: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
schedule:
Week01-Introduction of crystallography
Week02-External symmetry-1
Week03-External symmetry-2
Week04-Crystal classes, axes, and systems -1
Week05-Crystal classes, axes, and systems -2
Week06-Test-1
Week07-Crystal nomenclature and calculations -1
Week08-Crystal nomenclature and calculations -2
Week09-Crystal projections -1
Week10-Crystal projections -2
Week11-Crystal forms and class determination-1
Week12-Crystal forms and class determination-2
Week13-Test-2
Week14-Translational symmetry: lattices -1
Week15-Translational symmetry: lattices -2
Week16-Internal symmetry: space groups -1
Week17-Internal symmetry: space groups -2
Week18-Test-3
materials:
Crystallography and crystal chemistry by F. Donald Bloss
余樹楨 (2002) 晶體之結構與性質，渤海堂
